org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.quantize

Class ValueArrayQuantizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.quantize.ValueArrayQuantizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Quantizer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PreferenceDomainQuantizer

    @Shareable
public class ValueArrayQuantizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Quantizer, java.io.Serializable

    Abstract quantizer implementation using a pre-generated array of possible values. Values are quantized to their closest discrete possibility.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getValues

        public mikera.vectorz.impl.ImmutableVector getValues()
        Description copied from interface: Quantizer

        Get the possible values into which this quantizer will map input values. These are the values corresponding to each “bin” into which the quantizer will put values.

        Specified by:
        getValues in interface Quantizer
        Returns:
        The values of the discrete bins.

      • getIndexValue

        public double getIndexValue(int i)
        Description copied from interface: Quantizer

        Get the value corresponding to a quantized value, based on the index into the list of possible values.

        Specified by:
        getIndexValue in interface Quantizer
        Parameters:
        i - The quantized value number, in the range [0,n) where n is the number of possible discrete values (see Quantizer.getCount()).
        Returns:
        The value corresponding to quantum i.

      • index

        public int index(double val)
        Description copied from interface: Quantizer

        Convert a value into a discrete, quantized value.

        Specified by:
        index in interface Quantizer
        Parameters:
        val - A value to quantize.
        Returns:
